languages.text: "Не натянешь платок — станешь чьим-то врагом. Натянешь — тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Не натянешь платок — станешь чьим-то врагом. Натянешь — тоже станешь. Тут каждый сам выбирает сторону".

languages.text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."
languages.original_text: "Не натянешь платок — станешь чьим-то врагом. Натянешь — тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Not putting on a scarf makes you someone's enemy. So does putting it on. Everyone is welcome to pick a side."
"Not putting on a scarf makes you someone's enemy. So does putting it on. Everyone is welcome to pick a side."
"If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do. Everyone is free to pick a side here."
"If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do. Everyone is free to pick a side here."
"If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."
"If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

languages.text: "Wenn man keinen Schal umlegt, wird man zu jemandes Feind. Und wenn man einen umlegt auch."
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man keinen Schal umlegt, wird man zu jemandes Feind. Und wenn man einen umlegt auch."

languages.text: «Si no te pones una bufanda, te creas enemigos. Si te la pones, también».
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

traits.locale_text: «Si no te pones una bufanda, te creas enemigos. Si te la pones, también».

languages.text: 「スカーフを着けなきゃ、誰かの敵になる。まあ、着けたところで一緒だ」
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

traits.locale_text: 「スカーフを着けなきゃ、誰かの敵になる。まあ、着けたところで一緒だ」

languages.text: “如果不戴头巾，就会得罪一部分人，而如果戴了头巾，就会得罪另一部分人。”
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

traits.locale_text: “如果不戴头巾，就会得罪一部分人，而如果戴了头巾，就会得罪另一部分人。”

languages.text: « Ceux qui refusent de porter un foulard se font des ennemis. Même chose pour ceux qui en portent. »
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui refusent de porter un foulard se font des ennemis. Même chose pour ceux qui en portent. »

languages.text: "Atkı takmazsın, birinin düşmanı olursun. Atkı takarsın, yine aynısı olur."
languages.original_text: "If you don't put on a scarf, you become someone's enemy. The same goes if you do."
